0.text: Innate: Kennen's abilities apply a stack of Mark of the Storm to affected enemies for 6 seconds, which refreshes on subsequent hits and stacks up to 3 times. The third stack consumes them all to  stun the target for 1.25 seconds and restore  25 energy. The duration is reduced to 0.5 seconds if this occurs on the same target again within 6 seconds,

1.text: Slicing Maelstrom can only apply up to 3 stacks on a target.

0.text: Active: Kennen throws a shuriken in the target direction that deals magic damage to the first enemy hit.

Passive: Kennen's basic attacks on-attack generate a stack of Electrical Surge, which stacks up to 4 times. At 4 stacks, his next basic attack consumes them all to deal bonus magic damage and apply a stack of  Mark of the Storm.

1.text: Active: Kennen sends out a surge of electricity that deals magic damage to all nearby enemies afflicted by  Mark of the Storm or within  Slicing Maelstrom.

2.text: An enemy within  775 units with  Mark of the Storm or inside  Slicing Maelstrom is required to cast this ability. The target does not have to be  visible to be targeted by this ability.

0.text: Active: Kennen becomes lightning, a  ghosted form that is unable to declare basic attacks but gains  100% bonus movement speed for 2 seconds. He deals magic damage to enemies he passes through, halved against non-champions, and restores  40 energy upon damaging at least one enemy.

1.text: Lightning Rush can be recast after 0.5 seconds, and does so automatically after the duration. The recast can be used while affected by  cast-inhibiting crowd control.

2.text: Recast: Kennen ends Lightning Rush and gains  bonus attack speed for 4 seconds.

0.text: Active: Kennen summons the Shuriken Storm around himself for 3 seconds, gaining  bonus armor and  bonus magic resistance.

1.text: The storm strikes lightning bolts down on all nearby enemies every 0.5 seconds, dealing magic damage.

2.text: Slicing Maelstrom deals 10% increased damage against a target with each successive strike, up to a maximum of 150% damage with one strike.
